::Scorponok/Zarak::

Scorponok has tracked Maximal signals to their originating point. However apon arrival Zarak is confused that there is no Maximal base. Eventually he realizes that the Razor Wing Maximals are above in the city of Relay.

Zarak opens a comm channel.

Zarak: Maximals: on this day your past returns to haunt you. DECEPTICONS FOREVER!!!!

Scorponok's fusion tail blaster swings up, taking aim and releases a extremely powerful fusion blast at the city...
